content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 59, "index": 43}, {"type": "elytra", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft jungle_fence, I need to place 2 jungle_planks on the top row of the crafting table and 1 stick in the middle column. Therefore, I will first move the jungle_plank from slot 16 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "music_disc_mall", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 59, "index": 43}, {"type": "elytra", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Since the jungle_plank has been placed in slot 1, I now need to place a stick to its right in slot 2. Therefore, I will move the stick from slot 12 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 3 with quantity 1
